title: Buy Now checkout flow with showroom details

requirements.text: Add a 'Buy Now' button to each car model card (CarModelCard.tsx) that opens a full checkout modal/drawer when clicked.

quotes: show payment window only after clicking buy now option

acceptanceCriteria: Each CarModelCard displays a clearly visible 'Buy Now' button
Clicking 'Buy Now' opens the checkout modal for that specific car
The modal is dismissible (close button / click outside)

requirements.text: Implement a detailed checkout flow inside the modal with three steps: (1) Select payment type — full price or booking amount (partial deposit); (2) Choose EMI plan if full price is selected (e.g., 6, 12, 24 months with calculated monthly instalment shown in INR); (3) Payment details form with card fields (card number, name on card, expiry, CVV) and a UPI ID field as an alternative. The final step shows a simulated success confirmation screen.

quotes: EMI plans, a booking amount (partial payment) vs full price

acceptanceCriteria: User can choose between full price payment and a fixed booking amount (e.g., ₹2,00,000 deposit)
When full price is selected, EMI options (6/12/24 months) are shown with calculated monthly amount in INR
Payment form accepts card number, cardholder name, expiry date, CVV OR a UPI ID
Submitting the form shows a success confirmation screen with order summary
No real payment is processed; all data is mock/simulated

requirements.text: Display nearest showroom information alongside the checkout flow. Each car model should be assigned a distinct showroom in a different Indian city (e.g., Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore, Chennai, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Pune, Ahmedabad). Each showroom entry must include: showroom name, full address, city, and a plausible but fake Indian contact phone number (10-digit mobile starting with 9 or 8).
acceptanceCriteria: Each car card's checkout modal shows a dedicated 'Nearest Showroom' panel
The showroom panel displays name, address, city, and contact number
Different car models show different city showrooms
Contact number is a plausible-looking fake Indian mobile number
Showroom info is visible at the same time as the checkout form (e.g., side-by-side on desktop, stacked on mobile)

requirements.text: Store showroom data (name, address, city, phone) mapped to car model IDs in the frontend content layer (e.g., a new file frontend/src/content/showrooms.ts) so each car resolves to exactly one showroom.
acceptanceCriteria: A content file exports a mapping from car model ID to showroom object
All car models in carModels.ts have a corresponding showroom entry
No two cars in the same city share a showroom (variety across cities)

constraints: No real payment processing — all checkout interactions are purely simulated/mock
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
Maintain the existing Rolls-Royce-inspired luxury gold/navy theme for luxury car cards
All prices and amounts must be displayed in INR (₹)
nonGoals: Actual payment gateway integration (Stripe, Razorpay, etc.)
Backend persistence of orders or user data
Real geolocation or map-based showroom lookup
SMS or email confirmation after checkout
